description: A lot of the fans wanted to see a good, long, preparation of a subject ready for more, so that's exactly what you're getting as hung young Mason experiences the torment of being almost entirely wrapped in plastic at the hands of experienced master Sebastian. The young man has been restrained on the rack, submissive and silent as the black plastic covers every limb. What's to come? Stay tuned for part 2!
title: Mason Madison & Sebastian Kane
